name: §6§l§oLaevis
description: The 'Laevis' are a sub species of Indrevian. These are the sect of society of Indrevians that did not accept 'Indrev' as a savior of their species. Therefore did not accept technology as a main means of living life. Before the Indrevians met the Fortis, the Laevis set out into the universe to find a new home. Only to find Atmos instead. The Laevis upon coming to Atmos, centering around organics, discovered the glow berry and it’s properties.
